All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class HelpFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame

This class is only to show the help text for using the program.

Author:
Irene Thesing

Field Detail

TRISENTIS

public static int TRISENTIS
Used when the Trisentis game is shown.

GRAPH

public static int GRAPH
Used when the game on an arbitrary graph is shown.

Constructor Detail

HelpFrame

public HelpFrame(int gameType)
Shows a new Frame where the help text is shown. Which text ist shown depends on the type of the game, which is a trisentis game or a sigma game on an arbitrary graph.

Parameters:
gameType - which game is played at the moment, TRISENTIS or GRAPH.
